"<%me>, it seems like I run into you fai: "When was the first time I met you? It's like I don't remember anymore."
"Being strong is better than being weak. That goes without saying."
"Once you get stronger, whether it's fighting or retreating, your options increase."
"Of course, if you're not careful with those options, then you may do something you regret."
"I'm counting on you to make the right choice when the time comes."
"What's with that grin? Is it so out of character for me to be serious?"
"Just keep it in the back of your mind. You don't need to think too much about it."
"Anyway, I need to be off. Later."
